title: 04/29/22 DPS Hour 1 - The NFL Draft
itunes:title: 04/29/22 DPS Hour 1 - The NFL Draft
description:
In hour 1 of the Dan Patrick show the crew opens with the weeks hottest topic, the NFL Draft. The guys discuss if Lamar Jackson seemingly was displeased with the loss of his star receiver and/or the Ravens 1st round pick. While the Green Bay Packers still haven't drafted a WR for Aaron Rodgers. Dan Orlovsky joins to recap and give his predictions on future rounds as well.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
